listInfo.title: PROTEX-MF FABRIC BELT
listInfo.description: YOKOHAMA PROTEX Designed to be virtually “Maintenance Free” belt for portable quarry crushing equipment, first and secondary crushers and other high abuse equipment. PROTEX give you greater peace-of-mind with the lowest cost per tonnage and best ROI on the market today.

feature.subTitle: Features & Benefits
list: Excellent Resistance to Trapped Material and Build-up on Pulleys
Excellent impact resistance and cut & gouge resistance
Superior abrasion & wear resistance under extreme conditions
Best choice in rough operating conditions. i.e. Portable Cone & Jaw Crushers

listInfo.title: MAGNETIC SEPARATORMAGNETIC SEPARATOR
listInfo.description: With over 50 year's experience, MECAL now one of the most well-known manufacture of Magnetic Separator. Manufactured in accordance with the latest Australian standard, MECAL is very confident to deliver the best quality equipment to meet customer's requirement in very severe operating conditions such as dusty, hazardous areas, 24/7 operating hours, etc.

listInfo.title: VACUUM LOADER
listInfo.description: Vacuum Cleaner for Professional Industrial Cleaning.

listInfo.title: TELESCOPIC LOADING CHUTE
listInfo.description: For complete control of fine grain waste, this Open Truck Loading Chute has solved the problem, no more time wasted to clean-up the loading area at the end of each shift. When valuable product is being bulk loaded into Enclosed Trucks, control of the flow rate and elimination of product spill will save money from the day you install the NO DUST Chute.

list: High temperature application up to 250˚ C

listInfo.title: LIFTING MAGNET
listInfo.description: Mecal Design and Manufacturers Magnet for lifting scrap steel, plate or coils, Bundles, complete warehouse handling system, etc.

listInfo.title: METAL DETECTOR
listInfo.description: The Tectron® Model 50 is engineered for insstallation on conveyor belts carrying coal, minerals, aggregates, and other bulk materials. Used primarily for stopping bucket teeth, and large pieces of metal from damaging downstream equipment, the model 50 can detect significantly smaller metal (ferrous and non-ferrous), under the right conditions. The Model 50 is available for conveyor belt widths up to 48 inches (1220mm) and can be field adjusted to fit most standard conveyor configurations. The aperture can be changed from 11-23 inches (280-580mm) depending on the height of the product on the belt. Lightweight construction makes it easy to assemble and install without special tools, or the need to cut the belt, and the filed replaceable, microprocessor based controls are easy to operate and maintain. A self-test circuit activates a fault light and dry contact to alert the operator if there ever is a problem with the controls, so you'll never have to wonder if you detector is operating properly.

services.title: Conveyor Maintenance System
services.description: Conveyor maintenance services cover belt splicing and rubber component replacement, conveyor idlers and rollers change outs and refurbishment and transfer chute repair. Our services also cover maintenance management system, maintenance procedure development, planning and scheduling, condition monitoring, structural investigations, root cause failure analysis and repairs to conveyor equipment and materials handling machinery. With our depth of experienced managers, engineers, supervisors, belt workers and trades, we have the capacity to mobilize new project sites to carry out effective and efficient maintenance services under long-term contract and alliance arrangements.

listInfo.title: INSTALLATION CONVEYOR BELT
listInfo.description: Installing conveyor belt properly is important to ensure a good and safe installation process. Making sure that your belt will be used to its full extent, we can install the belt or assist your team in installing it. We ensure every aspect of your belt performs reliable, effective and efficient.

listInfo.title: COLD & HOT VULCANIZING FOR BELT SPLICING
listInfo.description: We offer both cold & hot vulcanizing of belts with highly skilled service team. The services include jointing of Fabric as well as Steel Cord Beltings.

listInfo.title: Focus on Safety
listInfo.description: Careless use during the installation of a conveyor belt can result in hazardous situations. Focus on safety and take no unnecessary risks by consulting our team to perform the installation.

listInfo.title: LAGGING PULLEY
listInfo.description: Our skilled crews are backed by a team of technical professionals to ensure the components will perform reliably, first time every time. We can remove your worn out pulley lagging, and install the best lagging solution based your changing needs. Pulleys can be re-lagged in the field on your system without removal, or in our service facility. Whatever the application, smooth, rubber, grooved or diamond, or ceramic, re-lagging can be completed to give your pulley its maximum service life, reduce shell wear, increase traction, increase cleaner efficiency, assist belt tracking, increase belt uptime, and eliminate slippage problems.

listInfo.title: BELT SCANNING & INSPECTION
listInfo.description: The primary purpose is to detect steel cord/wire damage (broken & corrosion) and check splice condition. With our Magnetic Flux Leakage equipment is used to detect anomalies or damage within the steel cords and splices of conveyor belting, invisible to the naked eye. The primary purpose is to detect steel cord/wire damage (broken & corrosion) and check splice condition. With our Magnetic Flux Leakage equipment is used to detect anomalies or damage within the steel cords and splices of conveyor belting, invisible to the naked eye.

listInfo.title: CRUSHER MANUFACTURING & INSTALLATION
listInfo.description: Complete all processes with our partner from designing to manufacturing as well as production & quality control in house. We provide size range of crusher with high-quality cast steel components and durable wear parts, means exceptionally high crusher availability, cost-efficient crushing and low cost per ton.

listInfo.title: CRUSHER RENTAL
listInfo.description: Provide material processing solution for short term project efficient and cost-effective. By estimate rental payments for the period of use and machines needed, we can help to decide which option best suits your business needs, whether they be rental, ownership or a mix of both.

list: Prepare recommendations to upgrade and effective treatments increasing efficiency and reliability
Decontamination, cleaning and stripping component down
Rebuild and upgrade crusher to like new condition, equipped with specialized machinery and tooling

listInfo.title: MAINTENANCE & SPAREPART
listInfo.description: Performing regular maintenance on the crusher, and source many tools and parts needed for maintenance and repair. Spare parts are designed and manufactured in consideration of the existing equipment manufacturer’s specifications, producing high performance and offering cost effective solutions.

List.title: PT INDOCEMENT TUNGGAL PRAKARSA Tbk.
List.description: One of the leading cement producers in Indonesia which started operating in 1975. Indocement produces premium cement under the Semen Tiga Roda brand which is Indonesia's TOP 100 Most Valuable Brands 2020 & TOP Brand Awards Cement Category.

List.title: PT BUKIT ASAM Tbk.
List.description: State-owned Enterprise (BUMN) that aims to develop the national mining industry, particularly coal mining in Indonesia. Founded in 1981, the company is one of the five largest coal producers in Indonesia with its domestic sales rank second.

List.description: Part of the Bayan Group, is an Indonesia-based company primarily engage in integrated coal mining industry in East and South Kalimantan.
